name: Flicker Feathers
description:
Flicker Feathers was inspired by the tremendous loss experienced by the community of Greenville, CA when they lost their town to wildfire on Aug. 4th, 2021. The flicker is an important bird in native Maidu tradition. Their bright orange feathers represent fire, friendship, and hope. A flicker of hope during the darkest of times.

By clicking "Support This Game" above and donating, you can help bring hope to others when they need it most. All donations from this game will go toward the rebuilding of the Maidu Roundhouse Council Center. Please visit https://flickerfeathers.carrd.co/ to learn more ways you can help Greenville and the Maidu community. Thank you!

Flicker Feathers: A Bitsy Game for Good is a Tech Together hackathon project created, designed, and coded by Danielle Tulchinsky, Jacqueline Anokyewaa, and Brooke Rahn.
